SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class ExtensionSettings

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.ExtensionSettings
public class ExtensionSettings extends Object
This class encapsulates the settings for an Extension.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Set<String>
    SECURITY_SETTINGS_KEYS
    A set of keys for security settings related to SSL transport, keystore and truststore files, and hostname verification.

  • Field Details

    • SECURITY_SETTINGS_KEYS

      public static final Set<String> SECURITY_SETTINGS_KEYS
      A set of keys for security settings related to SSL transport, keystore and truststore files, and hostname verification. These settings are used in OpenSearch to secure network communication and ensure data privacy.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExtensionSettings

      public ExtensionSettings(String extensionName, String hostAddress, String hostPort, String opensearchAddress, String opensearchPort)
      Instantiate this class using the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      extensionName - The extension name. Provided to OpenSearch as a response to initialization query. Must match the defined extension name in OpenSearch.
      hostAddress - The IP Address to bind this extension to.
      hostPort - The port to bind this extension to.
      opensearchAddress - The IP Address on which OpenSearch is running.
      opensearchPort - The port on which OpenSearch is running.

    • ExtensionSettings

      public ExtensionSettings(String extensionName, String hostAddress, String hostPort, String opensearchAddress, String opensearchPort, Map<String,String> securitySettings)
      Instantiate this class using the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      extensionName - The extension name. Provided to OpenSearch as a response to initialization query. Must match the defined extension name in OpenSearch.
      hostAddress - The IP Address to bind this extension to.
      hostPort - The port to bind this extension to.
      opensearchAddress - The IP Address on which OpenSearch is running.
      opensearchPort - The port on which OpenSearch is running.
      securitySettings - A generic map of any settings set in the config file that are not default setting keys

  • Method Details

    • getExtensionName

      public String getExtensionName()
      Returns the name of the extension.
      Returns:
      A string representing the name of the extension.

    • getHostAddress

      public String getHostAddress()
      Returns the host address associated with this object.
      Returns:
      The host address as a string.

    • getHostPort

      public String getHostPort()
      Returns the host and port number of the server.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the host and port number of the server.

    • setOpensearchAddress

      public void setOpensearchAddress(String opensearchAddress)
      Sets the OpenSearch server address to use for connecting to OpenSearch.
      Parameters:
      opensearchAddress - the URL or IP address of the OpenSearch server.

    • getOpensearchAddress

      public String getOpensearchAddress()
      Returns the address of the OpenSearch instance being used by the application.
      Returns:
      The address of the OpenSearch instance.

    • setOpensearchPort

      public void setOpensearchPort(String opensearchPort)
      Sets the OpenSearch port number to be used for communication.
      Parameters:
      opensearchPort - The port number to set.

    • getOpensearchPort

      public String getOpensearchPort()
      Returns the OpenSearch port number.
      Returns:
      The OpenSearch port number as a String.

    • getSecuritySettings

      public Map<String,String> getSecuritySettings()
      Returns the security settings as a map of key-value pairs. The keys represent the different security settings available, and the values represent the values set for each key.
      Returns:
      A map of security settings and their values.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • readSettingsFromYaml

      public static ExtensionSettings readSettingsFromYaml(String extensionSettingsPath) throws IOException
      Helper method to read extension settings from a YAML file.
      Parameters:
      extensionSettingsPath - The path (relative to the classpath) of the extension settings file.
      Returns:
      A settings file encapsulating the extension host and port if the file exists, null otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading the file.
